website_summaries.verdict: This lengthy hose is worth considering for anyone who needs the extra reach in spite of some concerns that are typical to expandable hoses.
pros: Extra long, as it's almost 100 feet in length when fully expanded
Lightweight and not overly difficult to maneuver considering its length
cons: Leaks in the hose and around the connectors are possible within a fairly short time of use
8-pattern nozzle that comes with it isn't very durable

customer_reviews.title: Try it out.
customer_reviews.text: Seen it in shops and been hesitant on how good it really is. My old hose used in the front garden is very heavy and a pain to wind up after before and after using and destroys my plants as you pull it and now it takes up every little space and works the same as regular hose amazed how it shrinks and takes up so little room and performs the same way. And no need to wind or unwind it on the hose cart..So glad I got it now only had it a week and no leaks...phew.
customer_reviews.author: RL635

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of fighting with our old, heavy 50 ft. rubber hose and found I just avoided using it. So far, this one seems to be perfect for my needs: easy to move around, lightweight and easy to store. If it develops any problems, I will come back on and revise my review, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kahni H.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Standard Hose
customer_reviews.text: I just hooked this hose up yesterday. It stretched 50 ft. with no problem and seems sturdy. I've noticed the flow pressure isn't as strong as my old hose, but it's acceptable. I love the "roll up" process; so easy! Time will tell about how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: R. Conner

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: THis was an impulse purchase after using something similar that my son had. I really did not like using the old hose because it was cumbersome, heavy and leaked! THis has been so much easier to use and the nozzle which was included is also great.THe hose is so light -a pleasure to use. Happy to have made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sophie tucker

customer_reviews.title: Hose with pressure washing capabilities!
customer_reviews.text: This hose is perfect for what I needed! Love it’s expaknaio capabilities! All of the functions work great, AND I recently discovered that one of the settings does pretty much the job of a pressure washer! I was amazed! Discovered it by mistake but was the coolest thing ever, because I was getting ready to either purchase one, or rent it to clean out the patio! This hose took care of that like a champ! Let me be clear, it wasn’t super old mold that had been there for years, but the whole area was covered in the slippery stuff.. and not anymore! I am extremely pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Hilda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: A Great Hose, Especially for the Senior Citizen
customer_reviews.text: I used this hose the day it came as we are experiencing a very dry winter and sprinklers are turned off. It was so easy to carry and set up compared to the heavier hose I have used.. While walking the neighborhood, I met another older senior citizen watering with the same hose. We had both decided that we were going to order another for the backyards! I know I am going to like this hose!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Have just had it a few days but really like the size and ease of use compared to traditional ...
customer_reviews.text: Just sprung a leak which renders it useless. Had for six months so clearly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Self putting itself away
customer_reviews.text: This hose and nozzle performed great. When watering it stretches as you need. When done just let the water out of the nozzle and it goes back. No tangles or knots etc. Love it, I through away my 3/8 - 1/2 inch hose with permanent kinks in it. Certainly a paradyne shift in hoses. The nozzle works smoothly time for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B. Guardineer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple of months I noticed a leak in the hose. Since I only use it 2 times a week, I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mutal

customer_reviews.title: This is the best hose I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hose I have ever purchased. I wish there were more than 5 stars. It expands perfectly and then coils back up neatly. Strong, durable and no leaks. You have a customer for good, thanks Flexi Hose.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Zusman

customer_reviews.title: great product, priced right
customer_reviews.text: great product, priced right, I bought one and when it arrived I purchased a second one, no more lugging around 50 ft. hoses for me. a young 80 years old and I want to take advantage of their lifetime warrenties
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!
customer_reviews.text: Trust me do not buy. I only write reviews if something is wonderful or awful and this product falls squarely in the awful category. Started leaking two weeks after we bought it will i frequent use. Save your money and look elseware.
customer_reviews.author: Lb

customer_reviews.title: Best Hose Ever!
customer_reviews.text: When our daughter recently passed away we wanted to maintain the appearance of her grave. It was almost 50 feet away from a faucet and the turf laid over the grave was not doing well. We solved the problem with this hose. It is compact and light weight. It is easy to keep in a grocery bag in the car. The length is perfect for our need. It drains easily, and completely, keeping water out of the car. We use it frequently to soak the turf and fill the flower container. Best hose ever!
customer_reviews.author: DWREAM

customer_reviews.title: An easy hose easy use and store.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Flexi Hose I have purchased. We are in the process of restoring 4 decks at our home. Two decks aré completed, so I need two hoses now and will buy 2 more when the others are finished. I love the Flexi hose because it really does not tangle. It is easy to maneuver around chairs and tables, and water all the plants. The hose is easy to store inside medium flower pots.
customer_reviews.author: FancyFootework

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this hose. It works exactly as it is supposed to and is easy to use. Only time will tell if it holds up but it seems to be very sturdy. It is so much easier to use than a regular hose or one of the coiled hoses.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great hose!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fast shipping, one day! Great product and very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Product came in, used it for one day and ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came in , used it for one day and next thing you know, it has a hole in the middle of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Flex hose is sturdy, strong but lightweight. Easy to put on the hose holder for storing.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D.

customer_reviews.title: The free spray nozzle made it a better deal.
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. This is definitely an upgraded version of flex hose out in the market. The free spray nozzle made it a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Reggied

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The connection piece between the hose & the nozzle broke already (November- February) and there is no way to repair it — and the return window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: Good except for the sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Hose performs as expected. Only problem is that you cannot fully open the control valve when the sprayer is attached because the sprayer interferes with the valve. Not allowing the valve to be opened 100%.
customer_reviews.author: PeterT

customer_reviews.title: The nozzle works better these the one I got a Lowe’s
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I have to buy a pocket hose every year because Texas heat is hard on them. This seems to be higher quality and fits perfectly in my storage “bucket”. The nozzle works better these the one I got a Lowe’s.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this hose!
customer_reviews.text: I always hated dragging around our heavy, rubber hose, especially since we had to cover distance between front and back gardens of the house. I also hated the cumbersome hose reel that we were forced to have to manage the thing. Now, with this lightweight hose that we can roll up and store in a pot, that's no longer necessary. It is so easy to use and the little sprayer that came with it is actually kind of nice. We liked it so well we bought a 2nd one. I highly recommend this hose. So far, it's durable, lightweight, and does its job admirably.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harrie

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product you will get rid of your old hoses the big heavy store room and everything else
customer_reviews.text: First one I have ever owned and I threw away 100 foot of regular hose one so use this for the first time it’s so cool will you shut the water off and and squeezed to handle has enough Retraction to Pull it self back through the grass I think it’s so cool in piles into a little pile is what I learned though if you wrap it up nice and neat it seems to get tangled when you turn the water back on when a stretch his back out Not a big deal it shrinks pretty small
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Love this hose!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This hose is amazing. I am 63 and was so tired of dragging hoses and having to drain them when it was going to freeze. This has made my life so much easier. The hose is compact and i can just pick it up and let the water drain out so easily. Here in Kansas the weather is so sporadic. One day it freezes and the next day it is warm. This hose has allowed me to continue to fill my pondless waterfall so much easier. I am anxious to see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good product... no warranty information
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of the hose and the fittings. One reason I purchased the hose was the LIFETIME REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE... the problem is the there is nothing on the box or in the box that gives you any information about it. It was listed on the product description but I have nothing to claim it... don't even have a way to contact the company from the information provided in the package. Hope I don't have a need.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Hose AND Sprayer Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Hose works fine. But after one season, the sprayer leaks at the edge of the rotating bezel. Results in water squirting out at 90 degrees from the sprayer head and getting me wet. 7 April 19. Update to review. Have to downgrade to single star. Had originally ordered two sprayer/hose packages. After one season, nolw starting second season, both sprayers leak and spray water out the side and one of two hoses has a leak. Have to say that it is reasonable to expect more of these products. Can not recommend. 27 May 19. Update to review. After very moderate use, 1.5 summer seasons, BOTH hoses leak. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carma Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic excuse for a hose, sprayer broke after a week
customer_reviews.text: This is my first expandable hose. Yes, they are light weight and no kink. The hose quality seems good. They do require water pressure for the hose to expand. Once it is expanded, you need to use a very low flow sprayer to maintain pressure. This means you need to use the supplied sprayer. The flow rate is laughable. The sprayers are very cheap plastic. I dropped mine on the concrete from about a foot high and it shattered after 1 week. (Wish I kept the box) You can't buy restricted flow sprayers at Box stores so the hose is useless. I don't have much use for a 18 foot hose.
customer_reviews.author: M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: great hose. I needed a hose that wouldn't take ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, great hose. I needed a hose that wouldn't take up to much storage room, but could reach my car to remove winter residue. This hose is great, it expands just like they claim and I had no problem cleaning my entire car, unfortunately they can't do anything about the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Poor product beware!
customer_reviews.text: i used it on my second job and everytime this hose gets water to stretch if you have it on blacktop or cement it wheres out the outer lining and next thing its full of holes. I had been trying to contact the seller about returning it since it is a lifetime warranty and never heard a thing! This is a waste of money. I went back to purchasing a big 3/4 professional hose and works much nicer. This hose didnt last two times of use!! What a waste!!
customer_reviews.author: kevin Bahe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Heavy-Duty
customer_reviews.text: I just got this hose and it's been raining at my house so no need to use this yet. It does have sturdy metal ends and 50 feet shrinks into a compact box. The hose itself seems heavy-duty and is drastically better than expandable hoses I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Completely broken and unusable after 1 year!!
customer_reviews.text: One year later I’m now in the market for a new hose because this one has completely broken. The internal hose I believe has broke. In half and now the water is lost to the outside of the hose and no water comes out of the end. Additionally the sprayers that came with it all broke within a month of use. Obviously this product is not well made. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I believe I will enjoy using this hose when our weather is warm and ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe I will enjoy using this hose when our weather is warm and things are growing. Product looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Kren

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised--great product--prime fast shipping--cheaper than all big box stores
customer_reviews.author: david sevland

customer_reviews.title: This thing works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: This hose is awesome! I used it twice before I ordered another one for my backyard. When I opened the box I was sure something was wrong because it was so compact. Nope! It expands wonderfully and then shrinks right back down. Agreeing with another reviewer that the free sprayer nozzle was cheap and not near the quality of the hose. I ordered again anyway because the hose is worth the money, and the brass fitting sprays well by itself. I hope it holds up in the long run, but I couldn't be happier now! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: tharper309

customer_reviews.title: Great hose, way better than the traditional hose
customer_reviews.text: Great hose, way better than the traditional hose. Getting 3 more for all water spickets outside my house. This one even comes with a spray nozzle. Happy customer :)
customer_reviews.author: THOW

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Very low quality product. Won’t last past a month.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it zero stars. Very low quality product. It did not last more than 45 days and has been used may be 20 times at the most for not more than 10 minutes at a time. The hose just burst. Don’t t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: vikrant raj urs

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a lifetime guarantee
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this hose twice, but so far, I'm loving it. It is lightweight and easy to carry. It expands when the water is on, and shrinks, once the water is off. Meaning you don't have this long heavy hose to carry back and wind up. And because it comes with a lifetime guarantee, I don't worry that I might have to buy another one next month if this one malfunctions. In fact, thinking about buying another one for the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: ANNETTE K. SPINAIO

customer_reviews.title: Great hoses that are reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I will soon be moving out of state and I really needed these two houses. Although I haven’t used them yet, I am familiar with the expandable type of hose. The products were shipped quickly and in excellent condition in the box. I would definitely recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Very much worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back it was too hard to carry my house now I can water daily love love love it make sure you can buy this brand the quality brand. First one was a mistake got shipped cheap one no good Amazon fixed immediately and sent the right one you want the flex hose only
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Silkwood

customer_reviews.title: This phone is junk!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this product review to potentially save somebody else from a disappointing purchase. This hoes I thought was going to be an answer to the problem with a traditional stiff garden hose. I was sorely disappointed that after a short. Time it had a small leak close to the end where you hold your hand which would get my pants and shoes a little wet. As Time passed over the next several months there are several weeks in a basically soaks me when I use it. Don't buy this! It is garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved the house but after only 2 months of use it broke and has holes all over it. I only use the house to water my flowers and I’m very disappointed! Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Does Stretch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product because of the stretch - wanted a hose that was easy to store --- THIS is It! Works great! Why only 4 of 5 stars? the hose is made in two parts, an inner fairly flexible hose and a knit cover to keep the inner hose from over-expanding when under pressure. The knit cover is HIGHLY susceptible to abrasion. Lay the hose on a sidewalk, turn the water off and watch it shrink --- but also watch the covering abrade (almost visibly). I have not used the product long enough to test longevity but i rather expect to be buying another one in a couple of years. YES, i would buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Expect low water pressure, and...
customer_reviews.text: Because the casing inside the flexibility is narrow, the water power is very low. Will likely return item. Update: today after I used it, it refused to coil. It's just hanging there. It's going back - I don't even want to participate in the lifetime warranty - don't want anything more to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lo See Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works for 2 Months...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly after just two months, this hose is useless. The nozzle snapped off and it’s not fixable at this point. $40 down the drain and I’m back on Amazon buying another after hose. I wouldn’t recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana R. York

customer_reviews.title: Hose is great!  Free Nozzle is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight...expands to 50 ft when in use and shrinks to much less when not in use. The nozzle however, that is junk and cheap. When you screw it onto the hose it leaks. Threw it away. But I guess one can't complain if it's "Free".
customer_reviews.author: SJS

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for 1-2 months and then something snapped within the hose and it no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade but already has a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I just bought two of these hoses. I upgraded from our regular old school hose and found these to be easier to store. They do get dirty especially in areas where we have some mud. And now, one of them has a hole already and when I contacted customer service, the said they are on back order and for me to contact them next week. Really???? Didn't seem to care about my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Wickersham

customer_reviews.title: After 1 Summer Easily 50 Pinhole Leaks
customer_reviews.text: We bought this beginning of the summer last year and loved it for the 3 months we needed it. We drained it, disconnected it from the house and stored it inside for winter. We pulled it out at the end of spring and it’s in the garbage before summer. There is easily 50 pinholes in it so almost no water is running out from the end of the hose now. I’m not sure what else we could have done to protect it. It should last more than one 3-month summer.
customer_reviews.author: RozieBath

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought three of these already this year and they last no time at all. I'm sure you're thinking why do I keep buying? Well, I'm old it's hard for me to maneuver a traditional hose. This one is so easy for me to water my flowers but they keep tearing up. I've finally given up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, try another brand
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last six months before it sprang two leaks! I always depressurize the hose and empty it of water, and it’s always in the shade so the sun didn’t wear it out. I’m waiting to see if their lifetime warranty is real and if they’ll give me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lilac

customer_reviews.title: Backed over it to start
customer_reviews.text: First off, it was delivered right outside our garage door and my wife backed over it on the way out in our SUV. I assumed a total loss but couldn't see any damage except to the box. It works great. Can't believe it. Couldn't devise more of a torture test and didn't even have to return it. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Donohoe

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Sounds much better in the description than in reality. I bought two of them think I could connect them.....Foolish idea. I returned one of them and felt I could not return the other because I used it... They stretch out fine but look out if you release the pressure. They want to recoil very badly and could knock your shoes off in the attempt. They can only use the sprayer that comes with the unit and the sprayer and the hose are cheaply made and work accordingly. I have already tossed and replaced the one I kept.
customer_reviews.author: brer rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Burst after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a variety of these hoses since my garden space is tight and it's hard to use a conventional hose without damaging plants while dragging it to reach the spots farthest away from the spigot. This one seemed like it had potential but, sadly, the technology is simply not there yet. Such a shame as it's a great idea. I picked this one since it had a warranty. If I decide it's worth the time to pursue, I'll report back here what went down.
customer_reviews.author: catherine niles

customer_reviews.title: Decent general purpose non-kinking hose.
customer_reviews.text: Expands to length given and shinks back down fine, very light weight and no kinking! Does not deliver as much water volume as my regular garden hose, so I only gave it 4 stars, but it is certainly adequate to rinse my truck during washing operation. I decided not to try it connected to my pressure washer because I was afraid it would suck it flat! Should work fine for watering plants and when attached to a sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great hose and great quality and very inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly a very nice product. I had read a lot of things about expandable hoses being cheap. This is NOT the case. Really nice quality and works really well. I live in NYC and space is a very big issue. Having a hose like this that takes up so little space is amazing. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JHa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hose. When I received a box from Amazon, it was really heavy. I thought I must have misread the description. Well, there were several other things in the box:). The hose is very light and you can move it around easily. I used it to clean my patio and it was a breeze. Even though it is very light, it is well made and strong. The fittings on either end look like maybe brass, but they are definitely heavy duty. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight hose
customer_reviews.text: The hose is great. I've had it for a year, and it is still like new. It stretches when filled with water, and it shrinks when it's emptied to easily store hanging on the faucet or in a flower pot. The nozzle, however, does not work anymore. I used it for all of last summer, and I brought it inside over winter. I just got it out yesterday, and the nozzle sprays water between the green and black parts. See video.
customer_reviews.author: M. MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Flexible Hose
customer_reviews.text: The Flexi Hose Expandable Garden Hose is a great deal when compared to other expandable hoses. It was a fraction of the cost of most others. It doesn't compress as much, and it a bit heavier than a premium one I have in my front yard, but for what I need it for it's perfect. It doesn't come with a nozzle but has brass fittings and does come with rubber O rights to keep water from leaking from the fittings. I've only had it for a short time, but if it lasts several months, for the price I'd be happy getting another. ~ Kort
customer_reviews.author: Kort

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle with it, and it will serve you well!!😀😍
customer_reviews.text: I use two of these hoses. One in front yard, one in the back. They have cut my watering time in half!!!! Lay the hose out, turn on the water, let the hose expand, then just water! There are about 8 different flow rates/styles on the nozzle! When you are done turn off the water. The hose will shrink back to its' fully retracted state, and you are done!! I store them in small canvase bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will this hose hold up for more than a month?
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hose because it’s expandable. I purchased 2 of these hoses. However I’ve had them for about a month now and the nozzle no longer works - the different sprays now only go in 2 or 3 patterns and the trigger stays in the on position and doesn’t turn off on it’s own when I release it. My concern now is that perhaps the hose won’t hold up either.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: Bought beginning of summer, worked fine no complaints. Today I walk out there and its leaking at the faucet, part that never moves. The hose fiber just came apart. Whole side of the house soaking wet, who knows how long it leaked and how much waterbill will be. For 39.99 you would expect to last longer than May 18- Sept 10 of same year.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Miguez

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!  Developed holes after two months of use!
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I really, really wanted to like this, and hoped that it wouldn't self-destruct like the others. I was lured by the thought this is reinforced. Sadly, it doesn't live up to the hype. Bought this July 12....return policy good through Aug 15. And this morning, I discovered not one, but TWO holes in the hose --- one near the connection to the faucet, and the other near the sprayer. Now wondering if I can even fix this because I can't return it, can't use it like this and don't want to just throw it away. What a waste....and quite a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: PCD

customer_reviews.title: Flex hose works as it should
customer_reviews.text: I like the flexibility, however, there are certain things you must remember when operating this hose. You can't just pick it up and squirt it. You have to turn the valve on the hose off, then turn the water on and let it fully expand, then turn the valve on the hose on, use it, and turn off at the wall first and let the water go out of the hose and shrink up. Maybe after I do the steps a few times, it will come more naturally, but I have to be sure to work it as it says. I do like the "vertical" setting on the nozzle; that allows you to use it for an additional distance.
customer_reviews.author: gina k

customer_reviews.title: Great Hose!
customer_reviews.text: This review is really about the hose I bought two years ago: The hose is well made, easy to use and very durable. I used my hose every day in the spring, summer and fall . Two weeks ago I make the mistake of trying to stretch the hose more than the 50 feet it was meant to stretch and I broke it. I reordered it at once and my new and longer 75 ft. hose is working beautifully. If you need a hose that you can move around easily and will use often, this hose is your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product So good I had to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super hose
customer_reviews.text: Tthis is the fourth time I have ordered this hose - two for my principal residence and two for my holiday home - so I obviously like it a lot. The hose is light and easy to maneuver and it does not kink. Also the spray nozzle that is included is light and offers numerous settings from a steady flow to a diffuse spray. The fittings are heavy brass and the hose has an on/off valve which is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Try another version of this hose.
customer_reviews.text: The hose is awesome but the idiot that designed the nozzle should be taken out and shot. You can't tighten any attachment enough due to the poorly designed nozzle end. Which includes the one it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: It's a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this garden hose that hasn't already been said... Many different qualities that others do not have: 1- it's stylish (a not top priority for a garden hose, but, it is) 2- easy to install and undo 3- no more random twists when pulling 4- easier to store I would have many more to add but I don't want to sound redundant nor I want this to sound "made up" I really enjoy this product and the price to quality ratio is at the buyer's favor... It should cost more technically! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Condello

customer_reviews.title: Hose loses water pressure rapidly
customer_reviews.text: Connected this hose today for the first time. When in use, after filling the hose as directed, it begins to visibly "deflate" right away, loses water pressure and flow, and needs time (after shutoff at the hand spray nozzle) to regain water pressure and flow rate. This is clearly unsatisfactory when watering many outdoor plants or hosing-down a walkway. Would not recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: book note

customer_reviews.title: good but limited
customer_reviews.text: If you turn on the pressure and have the hose closed it builds pressure and extends the hose. If you use a limited flow it will affect the hose length. Water pressure and flow will affect the hose length. A lot of the water pressure us used up by the hose. If you have a lot of pressure at the spigot, you will loose a lot of it if you have the hose open all the way. So, it is very light (and I got the 100" one) and very easy to carry around. But I wouldn't use this as my only hose.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: I used once and internal plastic fitting which connects heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: I used once and internal plastic fitting which connects heavy nozzle attachment to the actual hose was defective and broke rendering the hose unusable . returning for refund and still looking for a high quality hose that will last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product, In fact  Best expanding hose !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I do have an old fashion Garden Hose, but the most eye-catching feature of this hose is the ability to extend, its pretty cool and I like that most. You may see how in the pictures how this hose extending and shrink (after work). You will get great value for the money. This is a brand new experience, believe me!!! apart from that, I like the light brightness, durability. Since I have a large garden, I'm planning to buy another 50ft long hose, Its worth to have..
customer_reviews.author: SachindaAB

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: The two stars are for the hose. It’s sturdy and works well. The design on the brass fitting to connect the nozzle is awful. Because of the placement of the valve (which I needed pliers to turn) it’s impossble to get a good connection with the very iffy nozzle that’s included. It leaks and sprays water everywhere. I had a bit more luck using a different nozzle, but still it leaks and runs down my arms drenching my sleeves. Annoying to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzybee

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality hose
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and immediately opened it, at first glance I knew I was going to love it. From the packaging to when I opened and could tell the quality in the hose was nothing but the best. I took it outside hooked it to my water spicket, and when I usually have to fight the water hose I didn't with this one, was able to pull it and wash my car without the worry of it getting a kink in it or just not work at all. I can't wait to use it this summer and wash my car more with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Was great until it sprung a leak
customer_reviews.text: This hose was great until it popped a leak less than 2 months after I got it. It was nice because it isn't as bulky as most garden hoses. The hose has a lifetime replacement guarantee, but the documentation that came with it has not contact information as to how to obtain a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jillymc

customer_reviews.title: expanding hose
customer_reviews.text: I just received it and have used it a few times, one problem is it does kink, thats why 4 stars and the sprayer leeks, had to add another washer now it only has a small drip. I do like the hose and should buy a hanger for it. maybe later. I didn't rate durability because I haven't had it that long, will update in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: and it seems to be constructed of better materials and so far I am pleased with this ...
customer_reviews.text: After having resigned myself to the fact that the early versions of these type of hoses only last 1 season, you can't beat the convenience they offer with no-kinking and their light weight which I appreciate in doing my yardwork. I decided to take a chance on this brand even though it was a little more expensive, but they offer a no questions asked "lifetime guarantee" so I was willing to pay a little more to have it last. I have been using it for only a couple of weeks, and it seems to be constructed of better materials and so far I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Forewarned

customer_reviews.title: 50 feet, it is not.
customer_reviews.text: So the 50 feet is if you stretch the whole hose to it’s maximum. The actual hose when not under pressure is give or take 30 feet. Yes it won’t tangle, but it also won’t go around the side of your house easily at all. The outer fabric moves almost independently of the inner hose and gets stuck on everything. The whole product is just a bit eh. Could’ve been so much better, and don’t advertise your maximum length as your hose length on a flexible hose, that’s just silly.
customer_reviews.author: Saintfu

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my second one
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hose I’ve bought through this company. Although my first hose broke (the inner membrane detached from the hose end), the company’s lifetime warranty and responsive customer service was so good (they sent a replacement within two days) that I’m willing to take a chance on a second hose. As for the hose, it is so much better than a traditional hose. Lightweight, easy to move around the yard, and it retracts very easily. I also love that it comes with a nozzle attached. Definitely a solid purchase for anyone with a garden or yard!
customer_reviews.author: tigerlily10

customer_reviews.title: splits apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this, even though I only JUST started using it regularly. It split in the middle, then continue to split when I used it w/o nozzle. Very disappointed, because I was looking forward to a GOOD hose.
customer_reviews.author: unhappy/happy

customer_reviews.title: Good hose but started leaking within 3 weeks. Got no response from seller.
customer_reviews.text: I received the hose on 5/31/2020, it is super light and greatt like advertised. I loved it for a few weeks. It started leaking in the middle of the hose within 3 weeks. (I store it inside the house after using it every time) The FlexiHose website says to contact the seller on amazon for replacement, I wrote them and got zero response. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Pan

customer_reviews.title: Grows and Shrinks
customer_reviews.text: i like that this hose becomes so compact when not in use. But I have experienced some frustration with it. When the water pressure going through the hose is high the hose is fully extended. But if you cut back in the water pressure for any reason the hose contracts. I’ve had a sprinkler move across the yard as a result of the hose contraction. It has also jumped out of an inflatable pool I was trying to fill.
customer_reviews.author: lisac

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Despite tightly attaching this product to my water source, I noticed a leak from both the end attached to the water source and the end connecting the spray head. The hose has been stored in the garage away from direct sun. After three uses, the spray head broke off from its attachment even. I was definitely excited about this product given the great reviews and light weight features and even just purchased a hook to place it on. I will unfortunately need to return the hook and think I am just past 30 days to return my hose.
customer_reviews.author: Priya Khanijou

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: purchased 3 of these and after a week 2 of them have already sprung a leak in the hose . Save your money
customer_reviews.author: the boss

customer_reviews.title: What's behind it counts most
customer_reviews.text: This hose, like all other expandable hose I have purchased, so far has worked well without a leak. Question is for how long will it last. An even more important question, for me at least, is how good is the "lifetime" warranty. If the time comes when I need to get my warranty replacement I will update this review. 1 star if no warranty fulfillment and 5 stars if they live up to their promise. Hopefully that won't be for several years. I would have preferred a lower price and no nozzle since they don't seem to last very long. Wonder if the lifetime warranty also applies to the nozzle??
customer_reviews.author: JTown

customer_reviews.title: Best Flex Hose on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Talk about Amazing !!!!! When Amazon delivered I thought they made a mistake delivering a hose in such a small box. Since my first flex hose to buy replacing constant kink hoses this was my experiment to see if I could be convinced. WOW - this hose is too good to be true, compact, strong, does everything in a small easy concealed way. And you get a lifetime Warranty - who cant beat that. I will be replacing my other hoses with this product and go with the 75 ft and maybe 100ft. The perfect Product in the Hose Industry. And they include a Hose Nozzle that really works too.
customer_reviews.author: norristowndave

customer_reviews.title: So far so great
customer_reviews.text: I finally got tired of transporting 12-14 gallons of water via 2 gallon pail around everyday. Lugging around the 'regular' hose was always too much trouble. The 50' length is perfect for my use. Actually I have to slightly stretch this hose to water my last couple containers. A daily chore that took about 30 minutes is now reduced to about 10 minutes. My back also appreciates not bending over to fill then haul the watering can. The reason I never bought any collapsible hose before is people I know who have had them never had any success with longevity. Time will tell, but so far I really like this hose.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Koz

customer_reviews.title: What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I have RA so trying to pull a heavy rubber hose around the yard was just too difficult for me. This has made things much easier for me. I have it connected to the rubber hose and only need the length of the light hose when I move around the entire front of our yard. I'm careful to follow the directions that came with it, have it shut off and turn water on slowly, let it expand before opening it up. When done leave it open so the hose will empty. I think if this is always followed, this will last a good while. No more having to stop to unkink a hose, which is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I admit it. I treat my hoses badly. I leave them outdoors, Since I live in California near the ocean it sometimes gets down to about 40 degrees at night. The horror. And sometimes the sun shines on the hose. So when my hose sprung a leak after just a few months of abuse who can I blame but myself. And the manufacturer. So if you are going to leave your hose outside, exposed to sun, shade and use I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Leinweber

customer_reviews.title: Great Hose
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for me for Father's day, for my back yard garden. Previously I was lugging around a large heavy hose that would constantly get kinked. This definitely solved that issue, its light weight and doesn't kink. Also its much easier to wrap up when finished because it shinks as you turn off the water. The hose nozzle that it comes with is also good quality. Has many different settings, I prefer the shower setting to water the plants. The one my wife got was a little short for the yard so I'm ordering a 100ft one and move this one to the front yard.
customer_reviews.author: J&A

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for gardening
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical to buy this hose, but I was really over playing war with my old hose and tugging/lugging it all around the garden. Im a simple person. with simple needs. and I needed a simple hose that could a) fill up with water b) didn't give me a workout just to water my new garden. Flexi Hose to the rescue. So easy. So simple. So easy to carry. Not heavy. And most importantly doesn't get wrapped up in circles or get kinks. The only con is that the water pressure is amazing, but it's not bad either. Just setting expectations here.
customer_reviews.author: MsBlack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hose!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a similar hose from a hardware store and was terribly disappointed: not only did it not retract itself at all, within one week, it sprang a leak and had to be returned. So far, this one seems much more durable, and behaves as I expected: stretches itself out when filled with water and once the water is turned off, retracts to half the length. Very lightweight and easy to maneuver. And while I think this hose is likely quite durable, I'm also more careful with it than I might have been with the original hardware store purchase. I want it to last!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Was lovely and then turned into junk within 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Edited to say purchased the hose end of May and beginning of July hose is completely broken. We were so hoping this would be amazing for a long time. So far we absolutely love this hose! I love that it shrinks down small when there’s no water. I have to unhook it from the faucet after each use to keep my water crazy kids from wasting water and this makes it so much easier. It has tons of pressure and no kinks. I can water the garden with ease. I like that it has the metal shutoff valve on the hose so even without an attachment I can control it. We will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase/Leaking after 3 Months of Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hose in June. It sounded good in the description and I really liked it when first purchased. It was lightweight, easy to maneuver. It was used to water nearby gardens so was never stretched out to its fullest capacity. Yet now after only three months of use, this hose is leaking in several places. It is wasting water. What is really disappointing is that the return window has closed. Three months is not enough time to fully evaluate the quality of an outdoor product (most products in fact). This hose did not even last a full season. The price charged does not merit that poor quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: KerriO

customer_reviews.title: Didnt fit SEE EDIT
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit on my water spout outside. Very disappointed. Leaked everywhere and didnt even fill the hose with water. Will be returning. ******EDIT******* I was able to buy an adapter for about $5 at home depot that worked perfectly and this hose now works. Changed my review to 3 stars as this was inconvenient and caused much annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!  Both hoses lasted only a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these and they only lasted a few months of light duty around a pool in South Florida. On of the hoses split lengthwise and on the other the coupling fell apart. These were great alternatives to traditional heavy rubber hoses but the quality and durability are very poor especially for the premium price. Try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rojagert

customer_reviews.title: Expands Well, Durable, Quality Built
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I get stuff delivered quite often, so when a pretty normal sized envelope-type package showed up I had no idea it had this hose in it. This thing hardly takes up any space. The expands nicely, isn't too hard to stretch out and the material feels durable. It has been dragged through flower beds and gravel so far and no problems. I also was impressed by the fittings. Both sides be completely brass so that instilled some confidence right away. Those aren't cheap! If you can't tell, I think it's a pretty good buy if you're worried about storage space for such a length of hose. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have the hose less than 1 month and only used it just a couple days a week. I was happy that those retract to be small and very light. However today as I was watering my plants I noticed the hose has a hole. My old coiled which was cheaper lasted many years and this one didn't even last a month. So, I am returning to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: camellia

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Missed my return deadline. Had high hopes for this hose. My wife really liked the light weight and flexibility in her hillside garden until she noticed a loss of pressure at the nozzle and a stream of water shooting out from the hose behind her. Not durable!
customer_reviews.author: Plaidjim

product_meta.title: Flexi Hose Lightweight Expandable Garden Hose | No-Kink Flexibility - Extra Strength with 3/4 Inch Solid Brass Fittings & Double Latex Core | Rot, Crack, Leak Resistant (100 FT, Green)
feature_bullets: MOST ADVANCED GARDEN HOSE ON THE MARKET! Made from the highest-quality materials & latest design, The FlexiHose is the most functional, lightweight & flexible hose that money can buy! The 100 FT length is long enough to make it easy and convenient for maneuvering around the garden, even when full of water!

NO MORE LEAKS! - Say goodbye to your frustrating old leaking hose! FlexiHose's solid 3/4 Inches brass connectors & double latex pipe ensures leaks are a thing of the past! Complete with a sturdy on/off valve, the super-strong FlexiHose can withstand up to 12 BARS of water pressure, up to temperatures of 113℉!

SUPER EASY TO USE & STORE - Usage and storage is a breeze thanks to the incredible expanding design. Super lightweight, the Incredible FlexiHose expands 3x its length to an impressive 100 FT and returns to its original length in minutes for simple storage!

FREE 8-PATTERN ROTATING HOSE NOZZLE - Included with your FlexiHose is a high-quality, 8-pattern rotating nozzle, with settings for a wide range of uses from watering your plants to cleaning your pets or car. The nozzle is constructed out of durable zinc alloy and features an ergonomic rubberized handle that is slip-resistant and comfortable to use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars9,351 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
